post.author: Harry
post.content:
안녕하세요? COSKA 회원여러분...

다름이 아니라, Mike Lim이 제게 보내준 Job Posting을 올립니다.

관심이 있는분 신청하세요..

here is the one i have offical opening for  Software Release Manager

https://healthnow.silkroad.com/epostings/index.cfm?fuseaction=app.jobinfo&jobid=217489&company_id=15933&source=ONLINE&JobOwner=962081&bycountry=0&bystate=0&bylocation=&keywords=&byCat=45052&tosearch=yes

I also have
1 Project Manager for Test Environment Rehabilitation Project
(Contract 1 year + extension)
must be certified project management professional, and bachelors

I also have future opportunities in in manager and analyst role in the
next 6 months.
change management manager or coordinator
Test data & environment manager
Test automation Engineer.
1 Project Manager for Test Environment Rehabilitation Project
(Contract 1 year + extension)

must be canadian citizen and Canadian or US Bachelor's Degree in order
for us to get a US work visa.
all jobs are permanent full time with excellent benefits except
contract project manager.
post.title: Software Release Manager
